VPS Driver API » VPS - Common API » VPS - Scaler Config API

This structure define parameters additional to Vps_ScConfig to configure scaler modules. It can be used to set the parameters in the scaler registers as well as in the VPDMA register overlay. It also is used to configure runtime changes in the scale ratio. More...

Detailed Description

This structure define parameters additional to Vps_ScConfig to configure scaler modules. It can be used to set the parameters in the scaler registers as well as in the VPDMA register overlay. It also is used to configure runtime changes in the scale ratio.

struct Vps_ScAdvConfig

TODO: Verify HAL function for the validity of following line For the runtime changes, only size and position parameters will be configured but still upper layer will have to pass all the parameters because scaler uses these parameters to calculate ratio specific parameters.

Field Documentation

Ptr Vps_ScAdvConfig::arg

Currently not used. It should be NULL.

UInt32 Vps_ScAdvConfig::biLinIntpType

Variable to specify Bilinear Interpolation Type For valid values see Vps_ScBiLinearIntpType

UInt32 Vps_ScAdvConfig::cropHeight

Cropped image Width. Original image will be cropped to this size. If cropping is not required, then this should same as the original image size

UInt32 Vps_ScAdvConfig::cropStartX

Vertical Offset of the cropped image. From this vertical offset, original image will be cropped. If cropping is not required, this should be set to zero.

UInt32 Vps_ScAdvConfig::cropStartY

Horizontal Offset of the cropped image. From this horizontal offset, original image will be cropped. If cropping is not required, this should be set to zero.

UInt32 Vps_ScAdvConfig::cropWidth

Cropped image Height. Original image will be cropped to this size. If cropping is not required, then this should same as the original image size

UInt32 Vps_ScAdvConfig::defConfFactor

Default Confidence factor when edge detection is disabled. This is used only for the High Quality scaler where edge detection block is available.

Vps_ScEdgeDetectConfig* Vps_ScAdvConfig::edgeDetectCfg

Pointer to edege detect parameters for HQ scaler. If this is NULL peaking configuation will not be applied. Else configuration for this will be applied Values applied will be applicable to all the channels of the driver. This is not per channel configuration. Only used by VpsHal_scSetAdvConfig function

UInt32 Vps_ScAdvConfig::fidPol

This is used to specify whether input FID will be inverted before use or not. Use Fvid2_FidPol

UInt32 Vps_ScAdvConfig::hPolyBypass

Flag to bypass horizontal scaler. When this flag is zero, polyphase scaler is always used regardless of the width configuration

UInt32 Vps_ScAdvConfig::hsDcmType

Choose which decimators are active For valid values see Vps_ScHorzScalerDcmType

UInt32 Vps_ScAdvConfig::inFrameMode

Input Frame Mode i.e. Interlaced/progressive. Use Fvid2_ScanFormat

UInt32 Vps_ScAdvConfig::outFrameMode

Output Frame Mode i.e. interlaced or progressive. Input and output frame mode can be different so that scaler can convert one format to another. Use Fvid2_ScanFormat

Vps_ScPeakingConfig* Vps_ScAdvConfig::peakingCfg

Pointer to Peaking params. If this is NULL peaking configuation will not be applied. Else peaking configuration for this will be applied Values applied will be applicable to all the channels of the driver. This is not per channel configuration. Only used by VpsHal_scSetAdvConfig function

UInt32 Vps_ScAdvConfig::phInfoMode

Flag to indicate whether to program Scaler phase information from below values Or calculate locally from config. The variable polyPhaseValues and ravPhaseValues should be set appropriately in case of phInfoMode == VPS_SC_SET_PHASE_INFO_FROM_APP Use Vps_ScSetPhaseInfoMode

Vps_ScPolyPhaseInfo Vps_ScAdvConfig::polyphasePhInfo

Scaler phase value for polyphase filter case - used only when phInfoMode == VPS_SC_SET_PHASE_INFO_FROM_APP

Vps_ScRavPhaseInfo Vps_ScAdvConfig::ravPhInfo

Scaler phase value for RAV filter case - used only when phInfoMode == VPS_SC_SET_PHASE_INFO_FROM_APP

UInt32 Vps_ScAdvConfig::selfGenFid

Flag to indicate whether to use self Generate FID feature of the scaler. Use Vps_ScSelfGenFid

UInt32 Vps_ScAdvConfig::srcHeight

Source image width. This is the original non-cropped image width

UInt32 Vps_ScAdvConfig::srcWidth

Source image height. This is the original non-cropped image height

UInt32 Vps_ScAdvConfig::tarHeight

Target image Width

UInt32 Vps_ScAdvConfig::tarWidth

Target image Height

UInt32 Vps_ScAdvConfig::vsType

This is used to specify vertical scaling algorithm. For valid values see Vps_ScVertScalerType
